concept.title: 252.225-7011 RESTRICTION ON ACQUISITION OF SUPERCOMPUTERS.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 225.7012-3, use the following clause:
Supercomputers delivered under this contract shall be manufactured in the United States or its outlying areas.
